tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CarbonFootprintData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  emission_amount DECIMAL,
  emission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  emission_source VARCHAR(255),
  emission_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE reduction_efforts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  method VARCHAR(255),
  reduction_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE emission_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  source_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE carbon_emissions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  emission_source TEXT,
  emission_amount FLOAT
)
